thread.title: Informatica Cloud and Salesforce Analytics Cloud Now Part of Deloitte Digital's CloudMix
thread.title_full: Informatica Cloud and Salesforce Analytics Cloud Now Part of Deloitte Digital's CloudMix

author: admin
title: Informatica Cloud and Salesforce Analytics Cloud Now Part of Deloitte Digital's CloudMix
text:
Submitted by admin on 9/15/2015 @ 9:01 PM Companies mentioned in this article: Deloitte Digital 
SAN FRANCISCO, Sept. 16, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Deloitte Digital announces the expansion of CloudMix, Deloitte Digital's preconfigured, pre-integrated service offering that ties together the marketing of leading cloud applications for a cohesive cloud experience. CloudMix uses Deloitte's industry leading practices for software, banking, consumer business, life sciences, high-tech, and pharmaceutical sectors, and brings together market leading cloud technology providers. 
http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnvar/20150330/195427LOGO 
"By continuing to expand the cloud technology partner set included in CloudMix, we will usher in new data integration and analytic capabilities and extend the reach and value of our customers' data," said Andy Main, principal, Deloitte Consulting LLP, and Deloitte Digital's North America leader. "We are thrilled to be working with Salesforce, Informatica, and other cloud technology providers so that our clients can harness the power of the solution for how their specific industry runs." 
Deloitte Digital's CloudMix expanded features and capabilities include: -- An ability to aggregate, analyze and visualize data in the cloud -- A platform that easily accesses, validates and relates data across customers' on premise and cloud applications, and multiple Salesforce Clouds to enable insight through analytics -- An extension of the reach and value of existing investments in legacy enterprise data stores 
This release of Deloitte Digital CloudMix is the next step in creating a connected cloud ecosystem, based on leading technology providers. The CloudMix framework includes Deloitte's EVD methodology and reflects Deloitte's IndustryPrint process flows to jumpstart future state process modeling. The CloudMix preconfigured solutions and pre-integrated applications allow organizations to take advantage of a reduced cost of ownership and an integrated user experience. CloudMix includes multi-channel customer touch, project accelerators, tweet-to-cash reference architectures and assets, user personas, capability maps and a customer experience lifecycle framework. 
"With partners such as Deloitte Digital and Informatica, companies can benefit from industry expertise to extend analytics for any business need, making it easier than ever for anyone to explore and share data instantly, uncover new insights and take action from anywhere," said Neeracha Taychakhoonavudh, senior vice president of partner programs and marketing, Salesforce. "We're excited about the value these industry solutions will create for our clients." 
"The combination of Deloitte's breadth and depth of experience with Informatica's industry-leading Cloud data integration software enables organizations to derive value from their data assets," said Jeff Moses, senior vice president, Cloud Sales, Informatica. "This expansion of CloudMix provides advanced data integration through Informatica Cloud to help our customers leverage a pre-built platform and a highly trained partner ecosystem so they can unlock the potential of their data and improve business performance." 
About Deloitte Digital 
Deloitte Digital is creating a new model for a new age -- a digital consulting agency. That means bringing together all the creative and technology capabilities, business acumen and industry insight needed to help transform our clients' businesses with digital. With Deloitte Digital's end-to-end capabilities, clients bring their biggest challenges, knowing we've got what it takes to bring a new business vision to life. Let us show you how. www.deloittedigital.com . 
Deloitte Digital's Global Salesforce Alliance 
Deloitte Digital's alliance with Salesforce helps Deloitte Digital meet the emerging needs of its clients by providing multinational and international companies with social and mobile cloud computing technologies. Global Salesforce delivery capability is available through the Deloitte Touche Tohmatsu Limited network of member firms, including practices in more than 28 countries. 
From first contact to final delivery, our global teams are equipped to use Salesforce's social, CRM and mobile technologies to improve the way your customers work, play and communicate. Visit us at Dreamforce booth N1401 or www.deloitte.com/salesforce . 
Deloitte Digital's Informatica Alliance 
Deloitte Digital's alliance with Informatica arms Deloitte with the ability to help organizations address their toughest integration and data management challenges. With more than 2,300 practitioners experienced in Informatica products and a network of member firms that reaches 150 countries, together Deloitte and Informatica have the scale, scope and ability to help customers derive value from their data assets to achieve their goals. www.deloitte.com/us/informatica . 
As used in this document, "Deloitte" means Deloitte Consulting LLP, a subsidiary of Deloitte LLP. Please see www.deloitte.com/us/about for a detailed description of the legal structure of Deloitte LLP and its subsidiaries. Certain services may not be available to attest clients under the rules and regulations of public accounting. 
Salesforce, Salesforce App Cloud and others are trademarks of salesforce.com, inc. 
Informatica, Informatica Cloud, Informatica Vibe and Informatica Platform are trademarks or registered trademarks of Informatica Corporation in the United States and in jurisdictions throughout the world. 
To view the original version on PR Newswire, visit: http://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/informatica-cloud-and-salesforce-analytics-cloud-now-part-of-deloitte-digitals-cloudmix-300143075.html 
SOURCE Deloitte Digital
